voice_setting.chat_control_description:
**Use the buttons below to quickly change some settings! **.
Here are the button descriptions:

Use `Lock/Unlock` to lock the VC so that only whitelisted users can connect.
Use `Hide/Unhide` to make the VC private so that Only whitelisted users can see VC. 
Use `Mute/Unmute` to only allow whitelist users to speak, and only affect new users.
Use `Ban/Unban` to prohibit specified users from joining VC. 
Use `Whitelist/Remove` to whitelist.
Use `Limit` limits the number of users that can join.
Use `Change Owner` to transfer box owner.
Use `Change Name` to change the name of the VC to whatever you want. (Remember to follow the rules)
Use `Get Mention` to get the voice invitation URL, invite them to join the voice channel immediately! !

 Transferring the owner will clear the original restricted permissions!!.
